mgD1MjvnoVvMqONnx.name: Sympathy
mgD1MjvnoVvMqONnx.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

md6JcKyYZIl2EoDfX.name: Sympathy
md6JcKyYZIl2EoDfX.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

mOaQ0D8afruZWZ_la.name: Sympathy
mOaQ0D8afruZWZ_la.notes: Death of one party kills the other

mURyNzwm3V3NlUTx-.name: Sympathy
mURyNzwm3V3NlUTx-.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

mFmPyqn5IzEC1B_oF.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
mFmPyqn5IzEC1B_oF.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.
from others
from others
from sapient being with whom you actively interact (converse, lecture, etc.)
to Influence rolls

mYAoUFQNbHjm6rUr5.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

meUuSACZ91d11fidf.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

features.situation: from others in social situations when you have a chance to plan your attire in advance
to someone else's reaction bonus from others when you put together their outfit
to trained Acting skill for the sole purpose of "acting innocent"

mLfFUyfiR5UVmkRZ1.name: People Affected
mLfFUyfiR5UVmkRZ1.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

features.situation: to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial
to all rolls to notice interruptions while obsessed with a task
from con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.
from others who can hear your voice

tlFTkAzIpOkmNAJhF.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
tlFTkAzIpOkmNAJhF.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

tn-1nciZjWsHfsdBX.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
tn-1nciZjWsHfsdBX.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

tz5kWEDy74c6NpTJU.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
tz5kWEDy74c6NpTJU.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

thi_2yTs_7wUfFvId.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
thi_2yTs_7wUfFvId.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

tkz_bq_3jLudDpL1m.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
tkz_bq_3jLudDpL1m.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

t546cde83G0Z5jIdv.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
t546cde83G0Z5jIdv.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

features.situation: from others
from past victims and anyone with Empathy
to Interrogation and Intimidation rolls when you use threats or torture

thgBL-UdPE2yTohHq.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
thgBL-UdPE2yTohHq.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

tq_3dnTYt6YDzjKRc.name: Code of Honor (Professional)
tq_3dnTYt6YDzjKRc.notes: Adhere to the ethics of your profession; always do your job to the best of your ability; support your guild, union, or professional association.

t0uzmr4Iv-XlxRn_q.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
t0uzmr4Iv-XlxRn_q.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

tK00Db6UUYId2MFfN.name: Combat Paralysis
tK00Db6UUYId2MFfN.notes: In any situation in which personal harm seems imminent, make a HT roll. Do not roll until the instant you need to fight, run, pull the trigger, or whatever. Any roll over 13 is a failure, even if you have HT 14+. On a success, you can act normally. On a failure, you are mentally stunned.

t4FhsVpDfKW60_0w8.name: Cowardice
t4FhsVpDfKW60_0w8.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to risk physical danger. Roll at -5 if you must risk death.

tf1tG0ZLKsX-5nVaD.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
tf1tG0ZLKsX-5nVaD.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

tjgc3XfyhO4wRF2wq.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
tjgc3XfyhO4wRF2wq.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

t7vKFEk7oKyUtqFf3.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
t7vKFEk7oKyUtqFf3.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

t5ohU2FKmKGO-99C_.name: Gluttony
t5ohU2FKmKGO-99C_.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

tcSs-exjj1G4I1y6B.name: Greed
tcSs-exjj1G4I1y6B.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

tjQUZfGfNsR_-BfWI.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
tjQUZfGfNsR_-BfWI.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

tfDipbs8-krgjnGMe.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
tfDipbs8-krgjnGMe.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

t99y1K4DgTYwG_57q.name: Honesty
t99y1K4DgTYwG_57q.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

tCjJi8yTVajZnCNNn.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
tCjJi8yTVajZnCNNn.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

features.situation: toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

tzwdwWWP-WKvcPnnt.name: Low Pain Threshold
tzwdwWWP-WKvcPnnt.notes: Double the shock from any injury. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: from "macho" individuals
to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture

tizYdKe_GzExJx-Ph.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
tizYdKe_GzExJx-Ph.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

tphmZtVzfCbFbLb9R.name: Miserliness
tphmZtVzfCbFbLb9R.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to spend money. If the expenditure is large, this roll may be at -5 or worse (GM’s decision). If you fail, you refuse to spend the money.

tFFtfeAZLUKhdFnF6.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
tFFtfeAZLUKhdFnF6.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

tgM-mQ6BfVmOAdZ7V.name: Necrophobia (Death)
tgM-mQ6BfVmOAdZ7V.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

tuS3dIHzJarTRNS3h.name: Obsession
tuS3dIHzJarTRNS3h.notes: varies; Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to deviate from your goal. If you fail, you continue to pursue your Obsession, regardless of the consequences.

t0Lw991x1r_LpZqdx.name: Overconfidence
t0Lw991x1r_LpZqdx.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs

t61_MGqzry7avfILA.name: Pacifism: Cannot Harm Innocents
t61_MGqzry7avfILA.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may only use deadly force on a foe that is attempting to do you serious harm. Capture is not “serious harm” unless you are already under penalty of death or have a Code of Honor that would require suicide if captured. You never intentionally do anything that causes, or even threatens to cause, injury to the uninvolved – particularly if they are “ordinary folks.”

tI1ccXohq8SXKJeEn.name: Pacifism: Cannot Kill
tI1ccXohq8SXKJeEn.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may never do anything that seems likely to kill another. This includes abandoning a wounded foe to die “on his own”! You must do your best to keep your companions from killing, too. If you do kill someone (or feel responsible for a death), you immediately suffer a nervous breakdown. Roll 3d and be totally morose and useless for that many days. During this time, you must make a Will roll to offer any sort of violence toward anyone, for any reason.

tXFt8HH8WRw68eq-G.name: Very Unfit
tXFt8HH8WRw68eq-G.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the normal rate

features.situation: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc.

t9WtSfpecEWS0qEGV.name: Pacifism: Reluctant Killer
t9WtSfpecEWS0qEGV.notes: You are psychologically unprepared to kill people. Whenever you make a deadly attack (e.g., with a knife or a gun) against an obvious person whose face is visible to you, you are at -4 to hit and may not Aim. If you cannot see the foe’s face (due to a mask, darkness, or distance, or because you attacked from behind), the penalty is only -2, save in close combat. You have no penalty to attack a vehicle (even an occupied one), an opponent you do not believe is a person (including things with Horrific or Monstrous appearance), or a target you can’t actually see (e.g., a set of map coordinates or a blip on a radar screen). If you kill a recognizable person, the effect on you is the same as for Pacifism: Cannot Kill. You have no problem with your allies killing; you may even supply ammo, loaded weapons, and encouragement! You just can’t do the killing yourself.

tfAeiVeHvhJLblChD.name: Pacifism: Self-Defense Only
tfAeiVeHvhJLblChD.notes: You only fight to defend yourself or those in your care, using only as much force as necessary (no pre-emptive strikes allowed!). You must do your best to discourage others from starting fights.

tJDFZlXoyWKI8cWEi.name: Post-Combat Shakes
tJDFZlXoyWKI8cWEi.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

tEu9Y9b_fYZpD8Ds3.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
tEu9Y9b_fYZpD8Ds3.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

mdQkTdsKPYKsWhlMF.name: People Affected
mdQkTdsKPYKsWhlMF.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

tJWNd0VSvTQcpogAl.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
tJWNd0VSvTQcpogAl.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

t7Ij08b_GF8Lw8Jc7.name: Selfish
t7Ij08b_GF8Lw8Jc7.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces
from others

tVeZRFmRLrenXmrGL.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
tVeZRFmRLrenXmrGL.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

tyvKa0YTOfrK1lKUz.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
tyvKa0YTOfrK1lKUz.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

tNRH3OzE8dCjNtpU8.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
tNRH3OzE8dCjNtpU8.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

tJfeqqdZ5qj6JEecr.name: Unfit
tJfeqqdZ5qj6JEecr.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate

features.situation: to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc

t4k5vTS1ckTcKYOQE.name: Unluckiness
t4k5vTS1ckTcKYOQE.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

tvMY8GwrMrWp0Edt6.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
tvMY8GwrMrWp0Edt6.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.
